overview: Lifeskills4kids is a site dedicated for healthy growth and development of each and every unique child. This site is designed to provide parents, teachers, and therapists with resources, tips, and strategies that enable them to make their children reach their full potential in everyday life through children games or other means, it also prepares them to fight with Learning difficulties, Sensory processing disorders, Behavior and concentration difficulties, Autism Spectrum Disorder, Aspergerâ€™s Syndrome or Developmental Delay.
